00016 string SshLogReader::GetSshCommand(const string &logger, const char *export_params)
00017 {
00018    char buf[8192];
00019 
00020    if (index(logger.c_str(), '\'') || index(logger.c_str(), '"'))
00021    {
00022       throw "Wrong params.";
00023    }
00024 
00025    snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf),
00026             "ssh acnlina \""
00027             "setenv PATH /usr/controls/bin; setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /ride/release/X86/lib;"
00028             "exportLoggerData"
00029             " -logger '%s'"
00030             " -timeformat 'unix'"
00031             " -showmissingdatawith x"
00032             " -timetolerance 0"
00033             "%s\"",
00034             logger.c_str(), export_params);
00035 
00036    return string(buf);
00037 }

00040 string SshLogReader::GetSshCommandForTimeRange(const string &logger, time_t start, time_t end)
00041 {
00042    char export_params[1024], startStr[32], endStr[32];
00043 
00044    ctime_r(&start, startStr); // this should have timezone problems
00045    ctime_r(&end, endStr);
00046    startStr[strlen(startStr) - 1] = 0; // replace newlines with end-of-string marks
00047    endStr[strlen(endStr) - 1] = 0;
00048    snprintf(export_params, sizeof(export_params),
00049             " -start '%s'"
00050             " -stop '%s'",
00051             startStr, endStr);
00052 
00053    return GetSshCommand(logger, export_params);
00054 }

00057 string SshLogReader::GetSshCommandForFillId(const string &logger, int fill_id)
00058 {
00059    char export_params[1024];
00060 
00061    snprintf(export_params, sizeof(export_params),
00062        " -fill '%i'",
00063        fill_id);
00064 
00065    return GetSshCommand(logger, export_params);
00066 }

00068 
00069 string SshLogReader::ReadStream(FILE *fd)
00070 {
00071    size_t       buf_size = 1024*64, data_size = 0;
00072    char *buf = (char*)malloc(buf_size), *pos = buf;
00073 
00074    while(!feof(fd))
00075    {
00076       size_t read_len = buf_size - data_size;
00077       size_t len = fread(pos, 1, read_len, fd);
00078       if ((len < read_len) && ferror(fd))
00079       {
00080          perror("SshLogReader::ReadALL");
00081          throw "fread() error";
00082       }
00083       data_size += len;
00084       if (data_size == buf_size)
00085       {
00086          buf_size *= 2;
00087          buf = (char*)realloc(buf, buf_size);
00088       }
00089       pos = buf + data_size;
00090    }
00091    return string(buf, data_size);
00092 }

00095 vector<string> SshLogReader::ParseCellList(string line)
00096 {
00097    vector<string> result;
00098    char *copy = strdup(line.c_str());
00099    assert(string(strtok(copy, " \t")) == "Time");
00100    const char *tok;
00101    while ((tok = strtok(NULL, " \t")))
00102    {
00103       if (strlen(tok))
00104       {
00105          result.push_back(tok);
00106       }
00107    }
00108    free(copy);
00109    return result;
00110 }

00113 void SshLogReader::Read(string response, map< string, map<opencdev::cdev_time_t, double> > *values)
00114 {
00115    FILE *fd = fmemopen((void*)response.c_str(), response.size(), "r");
00116    char buf[8192];
00117    int line = 1;
00118    vector<string> cells;
00119 
00120    while (!feof(fd))
00121    {
00122       char c = ungetc(fgetc(fd), fd);
00123       if (c == '#')
00124       {
00125          if (fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), fd))
00126          {
00127             assert(strlen(buf) > strlen("# Time"));
00128             buf[strlen(buf) - 1] = 0;
00129             gSystem->Info("SshLogReader", "Read comment: %s", buf);
00130             if (line == 3)
00131             {
00132                cells = ParseCellList(&buf[2]);
00133             }
00134             line++;
00135          }
00136       }
00137       else
00138       {
00139          int len;
00140          double time, value;
00141          len = fscanf(fd, "%lf", &time);
00142          if (len != 1) break;
00143 
00144          for (vector<string>::const_iterator it = cells.begin(); it != cells.end(); it++)
00145          {
00146             char cc;
00147             do
00148             {
00149                cc = getc(fd);
00150             }
00151             while((cc == ' ') || (cc == '\t'));
00152             if (cc == 'x')
00153             {
00154                continue;
00155             }
00156             ungetc(cc, fd);
00157             len = fscanf(fd, "%lf", &value);
00158             if (len != 1)
00159             {
00160                throw "unexpected end of row";
00161             }
00162 
00163             (*values)[*it][time] = value;
00164          }
00165       }
00166    }
00167 
00168    fclose(fd);
00169 }

00171 
00172 void SshLogReader::ExecuteCmd(string cmd, string *response)
00173 {
00174    gSystem->Info("SshLogReader", "Running %s", cmd.c_str());
00175    int retries = 5;
00176    int retcode;
00177 
00178    while(retries--)
00179    {
00180       FILE *fd = popen(cmd.c_str(), "r");
00181       if (!fd)
00182       {
00183          gSystem->Error("SshLogReader", "popen failed, errno = %i", errno);
00184          throw "popen failed";
00185       }
00186 
00187       *response = ReadStream(fd);
00188 
00189       retcode = pclose(fd);
00190 
00191       if (retcode == -1)
00192       {
00193          gSystem->Error("SshLogReader", "pclose failed, errno = %i", errno);
00194          throw "pclose failed";
00195       }
00196       if (retcode)
00197       {
00198          gSystem->Error("SshLogReader", "process returned %i", retcode);
00199          gSystem->Error("SshLogReader",
00200             "You need to create a gateway to acnlina machine.\n"
00201             "In order to do that, add following into your ~/.ssh/config file:\n\n"
00202             "Host acnlina\n"
00203             "\tIdentityFile    /star/u/veprbl/.ssh/acnlina5_rsa\n"
00204             "\tUser            dsmirnov\n"
00205             "\tHostName        localhost\n"
00206             "\tPort            8022\n"
00207             "\tBatchMode       yes\n\n"
00208             "To start gateway itself use following command:\n\n"
00209             "ssh -l your_user_name ssh.pbn.bnl.local -L 8022:acnlina5.pbn.bnl.gov:22\n\n"
00210             "replacing your_user_name with your MS Exchange (RSA SecurID token) account.\n"
00211             "If you have problems, try using --no-ssh option."
00212             );
00213          const int delay = 10;
00214          gSystem->Error("SshLogReader", "Retrying in %i seconds... Retries left %i", delay, retries);
00215          sleep(delay);
00216       }
00217       else
00218       {
00219          break;
00220       }
00221    }
00222 
00223    if (retcode)
00224    {
00225       throw "non-zero retcode";
00226    }
00227 }

00229 
00230 void SshLogReader::Run(string cmd, opencdev::result_t *values)
00231 {
00232    string response;
00233    sleep(2); // a delay to give the exportLoggerData a break
00234    ExecuteCmd(cmd, &response);
00235    Read(response, values);
00236 }

00239 void SshLogReader::query_timerange(const string &logger, opencdev::cdev_time_t start, opencdev::cdev_time_t end, opencdev::result_t *values)
00240 {
00241    string cmd = GetSshCommandForTimeRange(logger, start, end);
00242    Run(cmd, values);
00243 }

00246 void SshLogReader::query_fill(const string &logger, int fill_id, opencdev::result_t *values)
